LanguageData.Gun_BeamGraser.label: beam graser
LanguageData.Gun_BeamGraser.description: A high-energy gamma ray laser which fires a sweeping beam that pierces thick armor and burns targets. Because of the health risks, grasers are usually only used by mechanoids. This one was made to interface directly with a mechanoid wielder and draw from its power source.
LanguageData.Gun_BeamGraser.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_NeedleLauncher.label: needle launcher
LanguageData.Gun_NeedleLauncher.description: This mechanoid weapon is a compact version of the needle gun. Named after its needle-like projectiles, it fires single shots with great accuracy. The needle launcher has less range than its counterpart but is lightweight, allowing it to be wielded by fast-moving mechs.
LanguageData.Gun_NeedleLauncher.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_ToxicNeedle.label: toxic needle gun
LanguageData.Gun_ToxicNeedle.description: A mechanoid-built gun that fires toxin-infused metal needles. It can fire long distances and will poison the target in addition to doing physical damage.
LanguageData.Gun_ToxicNeedle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_ToxicNeedle.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: toxic needle gun
